mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TBL_EXAM WHERE 1=1
AND ${SEARCH_TYPE} LIKE '%${SEARCH_TEXT}%'
order by ${UP} asc
order by ${DOWN} desc
order by CREATE_TM desc
LIMIT ${LIMIT} OFFSET ${OFFSET}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_EXAM WHERE 1=1
AND ${SEARCH_TYPE} LIKE '%${SEARCH_TEXT}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_EXAM (NAME , CATEGORY , L_CATEGORY , M_CATEGORY , TYPE , POINT , CONTENT , GREET , IMAGE , COMENT , CREATE_TM , UPDATE_TM) VALUES(#{name} , #{category} , #{l_category} , #{m_category} , 0 , #{point} , #{content} , #{greet} , #{image} , #{coment} , now() , now())
mapper.update:
UPDATE TBL_EXAM SET
NAME = #{name},
L_CATEGORY = #{l_category},
M_CATEGORY = #{m_category},
TYPE = #{type},
GREET = #{greet},
CONTENT = #{content},
IMAGE = #{image},
COMENT = #{coment},
START_TM = #{start_tm},
END_TM = #{end_tm},
UPDATE_TM = now()
WHERE IDX = #{idx}

select.if: SELECT L_CATEGORY FROM TBL_EXAM ORDER BY L_CATEGORY
SELECT M_CATEGORY FROM TBL_EXAM ORDER BY M_CATEGORY

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_QUESTION_LIST (EXAM_IDX , SEQ , QUESTION_IDX , CREATE_TM , UPDATE_TM) VALUES (#{exam_idx} , #{seq} , #{question_idx} , now() , now())
mapper.select: SELECT Q.*, COUNT(S.idx) AS select_count , GROUP_CONCAT(S.content ORDER BY S.seq SEPARATOR '#') AS Choices, GROUP_CONCAT(S.image ORDER BY S.seq SEPARATOR '#') AS ChoicesImage FROM TBL_QUESTION Q JOIN TBL_QUESTION_LIST L ON Q.idx = L.question_idx LEFT JOIN TBL_SELECT S ON Q.idx = S.question_idx WHERE L.exam_idx = #{idx} GROUP BY Q.idx ORDER BY L.SEQ
SELECT er.* , m.address_local , m.age , m.job , m.sex FROM TBL_EXAM_RESULT er JOIN TBL_EXAM e ON er.exam_idx = e.idx JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON er.member_id = m.member_id WHERE e.idx = #{idx}
